data.text: @ThoughtTidbits @CTVNews So the entire world is listening to truckers right?  Why are you people so nuts?
@8888meadow @CTVNews Was he a puppet when he told you to wear the useless rag?
@quirinogal @CTVNews Well according to leftist nutbars that end is coming very soon so it won't be long 🤣
@ShannonBrydon @CTVNews You do look like a super spreader. Stay home.
@CTVNews The head of the science table is struggling to keep his job and remain relevant. The end.

@CTVNews It is sad that this tool of health is so polarizing-- Yes to Masks(N95,KN95), sanitizeing hands & work place,  social distancing the unmasked,  Vaccines, avoid crowds, shop at off times or online. This is what I do to keep my family safe and healthy. Has worked for 2 years.
@Discover_Glover @CTVNews @fordnation It's sounds like people such as yourself still don't understand the issue after two years.
@CTVNews No it’s not too early. Why are people all of a sudden not “following the science”, but were happy to follow the science up to this point?! Hypocrite much?
@CTVNews Yes too early. Should have waiting until at least school year was done.
